info.title: Form Auto Complete
info.description: Auto completes other inputs based on specific element input values.

method.name: engage
method.description: Makes an element master for auto completing other elements according to input value.

parameter.name: $fill
parameter.description: The set of input elements which will be filled with the new values.

parameter.name: $hide
parameter.description: The set of input elements which will be hidden

parameter.name: $populate
parameter.description: The set of input elements which will be populated with new values (select etc)

parameter.name: $mode
parameter.description: Sets the behavior of the autocomplete elements in case any element changes its value. Accepted values: - "strict" : Autocomplete breaks on value change - "lenient" : Autocomplete preserves on value change
